constituent: about that time, spoon, sitting on the ground, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: When Uncle Bob starts his comic routine of sticking spoons on his head, you know it is about that time to come up with a reason to excuse yourself.
koohiiStory1: An alarm clock with a unique design: You set it for, say, 7:00 am, and at about that time the clock reaches out with a spoon and hits you on the head.
koohiiStory2: After spooning for hours it´s about that time he got some head. Dayum woman.
myStory: về lúc đó. thìa với trang giấy
words:
頃(けい): time, about, toward, approximately (time)
この頃(このごろ): recently
年頃(としごろ): age, marriageable age, age of puberty, adolescence, for some years
日頃(ひごろ): normally, habitually
一頃(ひところ): once, some time ago
頃(ころ): time, about, toward, approximately (time)
近頃(ちかごろ): lately, recently, nowadays
手頃(てごろ): moderate, handy
